snippet: The last time the Dow Jones industrial average rose so many days in a row was November 1996.
abstract: Stocks rise as Dow Jones industrial average extends 10-week streak, ending at a nominal high; gains are largely due to data showing improving recovery in the labor market.
lead_paragraph: The last time the Dow Jones industrial average rose so many days in a row was November 1996.

headline.main: Jobless News Lifts Shares; Dow Rises for 10th Day
headline.print_headline: Jobless News Lifts Shares; Dow Rises for 10th Day
